auth.pickname: Pick a name to start chatting
auth.name: name
input.login: Click here to log in and participate in chat
input.noperms: You do not have permission to send messages in this channel.
input.threadlocked: You can not send messages to a locked thread.
input.threadarchived: You can not send messages to an archived thread.
nomessages: No messages to be seen here!
errorahoy.desc: Something unexpected occurred! WidgetBot support (for site admins): https://discord.gg/NYBEhN7
notif.serverunavailable.desc: This Discord server (guild) is not available.
notif.update.desc: A new update is available! Please refresh.
notif.serverissues.desc: Failed to connect to the WidgetBot server, the embed is currently working offline
messages.pinned: pinned a message to this channel.
messages.follow: has added {HOOK} to this channel. Its most important updates will show up here.
